channel.title: Members need to have player rights of 1 to use codes
channel.description:
I downloaded a server from here:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,311548.0.html
And found that you need to have to have players rights of 1 to use codes, and I can't the script that is telling the server to do that, can anyone help please? Thanks!

item.title: Members need to have player rights of 1 to use codes
item.dc:creator: @icp_again icp again
item.description:
@icp_again wrote:

[quote=“MasterofPK, post:7, topic:283397”]Ok dude, It’s in client.java

Your’s looks like this…

} if (command.startsWith("home") && playerRights >=0) { teleportToX = 3223; teleportToY = 3218; heightLevel = 0; //resets height }

Just change it to this…

} if (command.startsWith("home")) { teleportToX = 3223; teleportToY = 3218; heightLevel = 0; //resets height }

If that doesn’t work do what o.0 0.o said.[/quote]

That’s what I did, I tried what o.O O.o said, nothing worked. I don’t get why, did anyone try downloading the source I showed them to see what’s wrong?

Read full topic
item.source: Members need to have player rights of 1 to use codes

item.title: Members need to have player rights of 1 to use codes
item.dc:creator: @MasterofPK MasterofPK
item.description:
@MasterofPK wrote:

Ok dude, It’s in client.java

Your’s looks like this…

} if (command.startsWith("home") && playerRights >=0) { teleportToX = 3223; teleportToY = 3218; heightLevel = 0; //resets height }

Just change it to this…

} if (command.startsWith("home")) { teleportToX = 3223; teleportToY = 3218; heightLevel = 0; //resets height }

If that doesn’t work do what o.0 0.o said.

Read full topic

item.title: Members need to have player rights of 1 to use codes
item.dc:creator: @icp_again icp again
item.description:
@icp_again wrote:

[quote=“o.O O.o, post:5, topic:283397”]There’s probably an int, mine was checkMembers(), and I think in the login packet it looks exactly like this:

checkMembers(); if(checkMembers() == 5) playerIsMember = 1; if(checkMembers() == 0) playerIsMember = 0;[/quote]

I checked, but I think I looked in the wrong location, is it in the client.java? Or in player.java? Or in playerhandler.java?
I can’t seem to find it… >…<

Read full topic

item.title: Members need to have player rights of 1 to use codes
item.dc:creator: @icp_again icp again
item.description:
@icp_again wrote:

Yeah I have done that. I even tried changing a code to

			}
			if (command.startsWith("home") && playerRights >=0) {
			teleportToX = 3223;
			teleportToY = 3218;
			heightLevel = 0; //resets height
			}

It’s like, when you log in, it either says “You are a member” or else “you are not a member go to the forums to subscribe” and then i try to use a code with a character of player rights >=0 and no commands work. I set the player rights to admin, and all the codes worked. So it’s really confusing.

Read full topic
item.source: Members need to have player rights of 1 to use codes

item.title: Members need to have player rights of 1 to use codes
item.dc:creator: @Sp3c_u_k0 Sp3c u k0
item.description:
@Sp3c_u_k0 wrote:

[quote=“icp again, post:1, topic:283397”]I downloaded a server from here:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,311548.0.html

And found that you need to have to have players rights of 1 to use codes, and I can’t the script that is telling the server to do that, can anyone help please? Thanks![/quote]

If you mean commands I Can help you or with anything else.

Go into client.java And Click CTRL + F

Search for the command you want lets say… home.

Its like this…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home") && playerRights >= 1)
  		{
        	String[] args = command.split(" ");
                toX = 3233;
                toY = 9313;

change the 1 to 0 save + compile

Read full topic
